message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be invaluable to your business. While I can't disclose the specifics at this stage, I can assure you it's worth at least $1000000 to me.  I'm willing to let you acquire it for $1500000. This represents a significant potential return for you. If you're interested, let's schedule a time to discuss the details further.  I'm confident this will be a mutually beneficial partnership.
